# load packages
```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(car)
library(broom) # for model residuals extraction
library(emmeans) # for model mean extraction
library(multcomp)
library(readxl)
library(lubridate)
library(hms)

```
# import data
```{r}

harvest7w <- read_csv("../data/harvest7w.csv")

```

#EDA
```{r}

plot <- harvest7w|>
  ggplot(aes(x = NSMS, y = Pct_TB,
             color = NSMS))+
  geom_boxplot()+
  facet_wrap(~PPFD)


ggsave(plot, "../output/tb_plot.png")

```

# mod
```{r}


mod <- lm(Pct_TB ~ Rack + NSMS*PPFD,
          data = harvest7w)


car::Anova(mod, type = 3)


```
